AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Livestock
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents intended to eat [PAWN_objective] after [PAWN_possessive] birth. Somehow [PAWN_pronoun] was able to slither away before being eaten and grew up alone in the wilds.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Illegitimate Royal
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the many Jeub illegitimate bastards born to the Snaff of Jeubscalon. [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to survive there, using only [PAWN_possessive] wits.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Child Soldier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of Jeubscalon's crack Child Soldier Division. [PAWN_pronoun] fought in many battles, starting from the age of only two years.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Raised By Humans
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was found abandoned on the border of Jeubscalon by a family of human farmers. For some reason, they took [PAWN_possessive] in and raised [Pawn_possessive] as one of their own.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Rata Jeub orphan
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is not native to the Rim. Instead, he lived in the slums of the planet Rata Jeub, the original planet from which all Jeubs originate. [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn many skills to survive in such a competetive environment, and put those to good use when he finally saved up enough pieces of silver to escape.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Child Gang Leader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always smarter than [PAWN_possessive] peers. [PAWN_pronoun] organized the local urchins into a gang under [PAWN_possessive] leadership.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cannon Fodder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the army of Jeubscalon. Somehow, [PAWN_pronoun] survived while his herd of non-sapient Jeubs were slaughtered.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Jeub Noble
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the lucky few High Jeubs to be member of a noble family. Unlike most High Jeubs, [PAWN_nameDef] was able to fulfill [PAWN_possessive] desires, never fearing hunger or knowing hardship.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Jeub Servant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the household of a High Jeub nobleman for many years, doing whatever tasks he required.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Botox Miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] labored long years in the Botox Mines of a Jeub hive before escaping. Don't ask [PAWN_objective] how those bacteria got in the rocks. It is not something that anyone should want to know.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Boiling Rock Inmate
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was arrested and sent to the Boiling Rock, an infamous asteroid prison for Spacer criminals, gang bangers, and other dangerous villains. There, [PAWN_pronoun] joined one of the many gangs and fought for survival. When he finished serving his time, he returned as a smarter, stronger, and crueller criminal.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Jeub Pacifist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] saw the horror and violence of his Jeub hive and desired to change it. Unfortunately, [PAWN_pronoun] quickly realized that most the High Jeubs of his hive were inherently violent; [PAWN_possessive] ambition was pointless.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Botox Farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a farmer, growing recreational Botox and processing it into drugs. He was known to consume a great deal of [PAWN_possessive] own supply.
